Trade/Device Name(s): UniCel DxH Slidemaker Stainer Coulter Cellular Analysis System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for UniCel DxH Slidemaker Stainer Coulter Cellular Analysis System automated slide maker and stainer with corrective actions for stainer module fire risk.
Indications for Use Summary: A fully automated slide preparation and staining device that aspirates whole-blood, smears a blood film on a clean microscope slide, and delivers fixatives, stains, buffers, and rinse solutions to the blood smear.
